name: places/ChIJTY_IOSRZwokRy8ccg0ZfUAA
formattedAddress: 212 Bowery FL. 2, New York, NY 10012, USA
adrFormatAddress: 212 Bowery FL. 2, New York, NY 10012, USA

originalText.text: Incredible pop-up with a wide assortment of affordable wedding dresses. There are different materials chiffon, satin, lace, etc.They have dresses for all bodies and they carry different sample sizes, that can be clipped. The employees are friendly, helpful, and sweet, making this visit pleasant and non stressful. They have large mirrors and lux rugs - very aesthetically pleasing. Make sure to book your appointment on their website; this popup will be here till first week of July. There's a 10% discount and no taxes. (They will have bridesmaids dresses soon.)

originalText.text:
You step into Cocomelody and all ideas of a “popup” are changed. Comfy chairs, cozy rugs, everything feels so lush and luxurious. This place is phenomenal! If you’re looking for your dream gown I suggest you look at at Cocomelody. Not only do they have a wide variety of dresses but they are AFFORDABLE. Not $1,000+ “affordable”, but genuinely affordable wedding dresses.
Good luck finding your gown!

originalText.text: Had a great experience! It was my first time trying on wedding dresses and there were so many dresses!! Qiara was so helpful and patient, she let us browse through to see if I wanted to try any additional dresses on. Was very very interested in 2 dresses and will probably make a future appointment to narrow it down. Yay! Highly recommend because the dresses are beautiful and affordable!

text.text: Had a great experience! It was my first time trying on wedding dresses and there were so many dresses!! Qiara was so helpful and patient, she let us browse through to see if I wanted to try any additional dresses on. Was very very interested in 2 dresses and will probably make a future appointment to narrow it down. Yay! Highly recommend because the dresses are beautiful and affordable!

originalText.text: I ordered a few dresses to try on at home and have previously received try on at home samples from competitive stores. When I received them, you don't receive garment bags for any of the dresses that you get. So no way to safely package them back except to try and shove them back into the box. But what came next was so disgusting. I unpackaged a dress that smelled like something had rotted and I physically had a reaction to the smell. Customer service had advised this "might be a new fabric smell", but I ensure you this is hardly the case and it's sitting OUTSIDE my apartment right now and I had to spray my entire apartment down in Febreeze. This is a safety hazard as nothing that smells like this could be safe for you.

originalText.text: Beautiful dresses at affordable prices! The staff were very attentive and ensured I had a great experience. I visited the pop-up shop twice, both times on a Saturday. Each time I arrived early to my appointment and they took me early both times; giving me more than enough time to try on the same dresses more than once to help me make a decision. They were also extremely patient answering all the questions and concerns I had about customizing one of their dresses. I ended up ordering my dress from them and now I can’t wait to receive my dream dress!!
